about_the_game:
Buildings with futuristic designs, various props for realistic urban life, drones and spaceships, etc.
This resource pack provides a variety of 3D stamps for creating sci-fi style city maps.


［SCI-FI City Pack] Contents
3D stamps: 178
Terrain: 20

-Holograms: 8 stamps (7 variations per type)
-Destination boards: 8 stamps (2 types, 6 variations)
-Vendor machines and drinks 13 stamps (3 types 10 variations)
-Spaceship 16 stamps (3 types, 13 variations)
-Fences 16 stamps
-Props 93 stamps (57 types 36 variations)
-Drones 4 stamps (3 types, 1 variation)
-Energy systems 30 stamps (26 types 4 variations)
-Buildings 17 stamps
-Prefabs 8 stamps

Sample map 1
